pca_name: Electronic and Computer Equipment Manufacturing
description_timeline: QUICK CIRCUITS INC. and EXPERT CIRCUITS INC. operated as electronic parts and components manufacturers, generating acid, alkaline, and solvent wastes. Records from 1992-2016.

pca_name: Metal Fabrication
description_timeline: ABILITY MACHINE AND MFG. INC. and CRITICAL MACHINING operated as machine shops, generating petroleum distillate waste. Records from 1992-1998.

pca_name: Foam and Expanded Foam Manufacturing and Processing
description_timeline: INNOVATIVE CHOICES operated as a foamed and expanded plastics business, generating solvent and polymeric wastes. Records from 1996-2001.

pca_name: Storage, maintenance, fuelling and repair of equipment, vehicles, and material used to maintain transportation systems
description_timeline: DASA MANUFACTURING 2010 LTD. generated waste oils and lubricants as part of its small electrical appliance manufacturing. Records from 2010-2014.

pca_name: Metal Treatment, Coating, Plating and Finishing
description_timeline: BRITE PLATING LTD. operated a metal coating facility, generating neutralized heavy metal wastes. Records from 1992-1998.

pca_name: Textile Manufacturing and Processing
description_timeline: CANADIAN STARS SPORTSWEAR INC. and Gold-Tex Garment Manufacturing operated as clothing manufacturers. Records from 1998.

pca_name: Ink Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: Lema Printing Services Inc. operated a printing facility. Records from 1996.

pca_name: Transformer Manufacturing, Processing and Use
description_timeline: ROYAL BANK OF CANADA and ROYAL BANK REALTY INC. stored and generated PCB waste, including Askarel and drums of ballasts with high-level PCBs. Records from 1989-2004.

pca_name: Storage, maintenance, fuelling and repair of equipment, vehicles, and material used to maintain transportation systems
description_timeline: TELUS Communications, Oxford Properties Group, and Menkes Developments generated waste crankcase oils, lubricants, light fuels, and solvents. Records from 2003-2016.

pca_name: Waste Disposal and Waste Management, including thermal treatment, landfilling and transfer of waste, other than use of biosoils as soil conditioners
description_timeline: Athlete's Care generated pathological wastes. Records from 2012-2016.

pca_name: Paints Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: MENKES PROPERTY MANAGMENT SERVICES LTD. generated paint, pigment, and coating residue wastes. Records from 2007-2011.

pca_name: Pharmaceutical Manufacturing and Processing
description_timeline: ORGANON CANADA LTD. listed as a pharmaceutical preparations wholesaler/distributor. SCT record active.

pca_name: Metal Treatment, Coating, Plating and Finishing
description_timeline: HOPE PRO REFINISHING generated aromatic solvent wastes. GEN record from 2015.

pca_name: Ink Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: GINO PRINTING INC. and LEMA PRINTING SERVICES INC. operated printing facilities, generating petroleum distillates and graphic art wastes. Records from 1997-2006.

pca_name: Vehicles and Associated Parts Manufacturing
description_timeline: MODU-TRONICS INC manufactured vehicle accessories and generated halogenated solvents and waste oils. Records from 1986-1998.

pca_name: Electricity Generation, Transformation and Power Stations
description_timeline: Co-Steel Inc. had an approval for the installation of a standby diesel generator in 2000.

pca_name: Waste Disposal and Waste Management, including thermal treatment, landfilling and transfer of waste, other than use of biosoils as soil conditioners
description_timeline: Various tenants including CITY OF TORONTO PROPERTY DEPARTMENT and STATE FARM INSURANCE generated pathological and photoprocessing wastes. Records from 1992-2016.

pca_name: Storage, maintenance, fuelling and repair of equipment, vehicles, and material used to maintain transportation systems
description_timeline: 8174709 Canada Inc. generated light fuels and waste crankcase oils. Records from 2012-2016.

pca_name: Paints Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: 8174709 Canada Inc. generated wastes from the use of pigments, coatings and paints. Records from 2012-2016.

pca_name: Solvent Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: STATE FARM INSURANCE generated halogenated solvent waste. Records from 1992-2006.

pca_name: Chemical Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: FIRST BRANDS (CANADA) CORP. was listed for manufacturing/distributing chemicals and chemical preparations. SCT record established 1986.

pca_name: Vehicles and Associated Parts Manufacturing
description_timeline: A.G. Simpson Co. Ltd. operated a motor vehicle parts manufacturing facility, including metal stamping. Numerous records from 1947-2014.

pca_name: Metal Treatment, Coating, Plating and Finishing
description_timeline: A.G. Simpson Co. Ltd. conducted coating, heat treating, and welding activities, generating related wastes and air emissions. Records from 1998-2013.

pca_name: Chemical Manufacturing, Processing and Bulk Storage
description_timeline: A.G. Simpson Co. Ltd. used and generated waste from various chemicals including hydrochloric acid, sulphuric acid, and various solvents. Records from 1986-2013.

pca_name: Transformer Manufacturing, Processing and Use
description_timeline: A.G. Simpson Co. Ltd. was a registered PCB storage site, with records of Askarel, capacitors, and other PCB wastes. Records from 1991-2013.

pca_name: Gasoline and Associated Products Storage in Fixed Tanks
description_timeline: A G SIMPSON held a retail fuel license for a 3600L tank, with an expiry date of 1993.

pca_name: Waste Disposal and Waste Management, including thermal treatment, landfilling and transfer of waste, other than use of biosoils as soil conditioners
description_timeline: Corporate Medical Centre and The Scarborough Hospital generated pathological wastes. Records from 2000-2016.

pca_name: Pharmaceutical Manufacturing and Processing
description_timeline: Corporate Medical Centre and GUARDIAN CORPORATE PHARMACY generated pharmaceutical wastes. Records from 2000-2016.
